name: Neuschwanstein Castle
summary: You now can explore the world-famous castle of Neuschwanstein, the original to the Magic Kingdom Disney castle, without leaving your home, even without leaving your couch!  Enjoy the most beautiful rooms of the castle through impressive panorama pictures, walk unhurriedly through the splendid chambers and look very thoroughly at any detail. With impressive all-around pictures this app shows all the places of interest - without the tourist crowds and without the jostle!
